proxy_params_auth_deprecation.description:
Authentication details for the the proxy configured in the {telegram_bot} integration should be moved into the {proxy_url} instead. Please update your configuration and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

The {proxy_params} config key will be removed in a future release.
proxy_params_auth_deprecation.title: {telegram_bot}: Proxy authentication should be moved to the URL

proxy_params_deprecation.description:
The {proxy_params} config key for the {telegram_bot} integration will be removed in a future release.

Authentication can now be provided through the {proxy_url} key.

The underlying library has changed to {httpx} which is incompatible with previous parameters. If you still need this functionality for other options, please leave a comment on the learn more link.

Please update your configuration to remove the {proxy_params} key and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
proxy_params_deprecation.title: {telegram_bot}: Proxy params option will be removed

answer_callback_query.description: Responds to a callback query originated by clicking on an online keyboard button. The answer will be displayed to the user as a notification at the top of the chat screen or as an alert.

callback_query_id.name: Callback query ID
